result.arabic_text: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَسۡتَ مُرۡسَلٗاۚ قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ وَمَنۡ عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
result.translation: Ba bandi bahakanye baravuga bati “Ntabwo (wowe Muhamadi) uri Intumwa.” Vuga uti “Allah arahagije kuba umuhamya hagati yanjye namwe ndetse n’abafite ubumenyi bw’igitabo (baje kuyoboka Isilamu).”
